name: Polen
description:
Fly around, connect with nature  and solve brainteasers 🧠 in this satisfying puzzle game 🧩👾 about bees and flowers 🌺🐝.

FEATURES:

  • Five levels with approximately 10 minutes of puzzling gameplay
  • Adaptive music
  • Satisfying nature aesthetic

HOW TO PLAY:

  • Fly around: Use the arrow keys or WASD
  • Pollinite flowers: Check how many flowers you must pollinite (top-center)
  • Watch your moves: Check how many movements you have left (top-center)
  • Restart a level: Click the reset button on the pause menu (top-right)

If you like this game and enjoy playing it, we really appreciate your support in any way you can: share, donate, like, comment, everything helps. That lets us know there is at least a small community of people who would like to see what this game could get to bee 🌺🐝🌼
